channel.title: kees on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in kees on Joost Plattel

item.title: Twins in New York!
item.description: Being in de United States is a perfect excuse for visiting my brother! After enjoying a 5 hour flight (with wifi!) and a delayed subway ride: here's the two of us before the skyline of New York City: I've had 8 days to explore the city, mostly by foot and metro. The first I found the most enjoyable, while the latter turned out to be faster most of the time.

item.title: Karlskrona, Sweden
item.description: [caption id="attachment_2476" align="aligncenter" width="612" caption="Karlskrona - Sweden"][/caption] Just here for a few days, united with my brother. Travelling trough Kopenhagen and the lower country-side of Sweden. Visiting Hyper Island while my brother finishes his project and going by train to Malm√∂ on the last day.
